testimonial1.quote: I've tried other ride-sharing apps, but Rue Ride is by far the best. The prices are competitive, the service is reliable, and I love the option to choose my preferred car type.
testimonial1.name: Marie D.

testimonial2.quote: As a woman, I feel safe using Rue Ride. The app provides real-time tracking and allows me to share my ride details with loved ones. The drivers are always respectful.
testimonial2.name: Sophie L.

testimonials.title: What Our Beta Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: We've been testing with a select group of users. Here's what they think so far.

review1.quote: Rue Ride has been a game-changer for me! I used to dread rush hour traffic, but now I just relax and let Rue Ride handle the driving. The app is super easy to use.
review1.name: Lucas B.

review2.quote: Rue Ride has made a huge difference in my life. It's convenient, affordable, and has created job opportunities for many people. Great service!
review2.name: Amélie P.

review3.quote: The drivers are always professional and the cars are clean. I use Rue Ride for all my airport transfers now. Highly recommended for anyone in Paris!
review3.name: Thomas M.

faq.title: Rue Ride FAQs
faq.subtitle: Find your topic questioned answered here. If you can't find what you're looking for, contact our support team.

booking.question: How do I book a ride?
booking.answer: Download the Rue Ride app from the App Store or Google Play Store. Sign up with your phone number, enter your pickup and destination, choose your ride type, and confirm. A driver will be assigned to you within minutes.

payment.question: How can I change my payment method?
payment.answer: Go to Settings in the app, then Payment Methods. You can add, remove, or set a default payment method. We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and cash payments.

cancel.question: What happens if my driver doesn't arrive or there's a missing item?
cancel.answer: If your driver doesn't arrive within 10 minutes, you can cancel for free and rebook. For missing items, use the 'Lost & Found' feature in the app or contact our 24/7 support team.

driver.question: How do I become a Rue Ride driver?
driver.answer: Visit our website or download the Driver app. You'll need a valid driver's license, proof of insurance, and to pass our background check. Most applications are processed within 48 hours.

safety.question: How does Rue Ride ensure passenger safety?
safety.answer: All drivers undergo thorough background checks. The app provides real-time ride tracking, an emergency button, and the ability to share your trip with friends and family. All rides are GPS monitored.

support.question: How can I contact customer support?
support.answer: You can reach us 24/7 through the in-app chat, by calling our hotline, or via email at support@rueride.fr. We typically respond within 5 minutes during business hours.
